CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `example`;
USE `example`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `example`.`mentor`
(
  /*------------------------*/
  /* MEMBER VARIABLES       */
  /*------------------------*/

  /*mentor Associations*/
  student_number VARCHAR(255),

  name VARCHAR(255),
  PRIMARY KEY(name)

);
